title: Shadowflame Bow
summaries: The Shadowflame Bow is a Hardmode bow that converts any type of arrow into special Shadowflame Arrows, which pierce up to two enemies before dissipating on the third hit while also inflicting the Shadowflame debuff for 2â€“5 seconds. Shadowflame Arrows fly relatively slowly, but have an extremely high arc compared to most arrows, and may seem at first to be unaffected by gravity at all. If fired directly upwards, Shadowflame Arrows can travel 250 tiles skyward before beginning their descent, taking approximately 12 seconds from firing to fall back down to the player's position. The Shadowflame Bow also has a base 7% critical strike chance as opposed to the usual 4%.
The Shadowflame Bow has a 1/6 (16.67%) / 1/3 (33.33%) chance to drop from Goblin Warlocks during a Hardmode Goblin Army.
